channel.title: Software on F. Cheng's Talk
channel.description: Recent content in Software on F. Cheng's Talk

item.title: Fast data transfer/sync using globus
item.description: About Globus Globus is a secure, reliable research data management service. It works as a bridge between the remote Endpoint and the local Endpoint, rather than the cloud. With Globus, subscribers can move, share, publish & discover data via a single interface – whether your files live on a supercomputer, lab cluster, tape archive, public cloud or your laptop, you can manage this data from anywhere, using your existing identities, via just a web browser.

item.title: Run Unix executable binary on MATLAB
item.description: As a MATLAB guy and *nix guy, you may want to fulfill everything on MATLAB, or on command line. I will choose the former one. Call SYSTEM command in MATLAB MATLAB has its own bssh PATH, which is different from the *nix PATH. But a workaround consists in modifying the script (/Applications/MATLAB_R*****.app/bin/matlab) that launches MATLAB. $ cd /Applications/MATLAB_R*****.app/bin/ $ vi matlab # add the following line after #!/bin/sh $ export PATH:$PATH Then, add this matlab into your ~/.

item.title: modify citation style in mendeley
item.description: 作为文献管理工具，Mendeley可以说深得民心。当然，国内用户可能会对其不稳定的服务器不爽，但是不算是影响生产力的问题。唯一让我崩溃的一件

item.title: Free license for beyond compare MAC/Win/Linux
item.description: Thanks HUQI’s share! check the lic file 'huqi/trial.key' from above link Take MAC for example: download beyond compare package install replace trial.key under /Applications/Beyond\ Compare.app/Contents/Resources/trial.key with above license save trial.key & restart app Usage: install command line tool e.g., $ bcompare new.f90 old.f90 $ bcompare /Folder1/ /Folder2/ install Beyond Compare plugin on sublime text Notes: Refer the comments on huqi’s Githu for more info This license works for 4.

item.title: SU数据兼容性问题
item.description: When we try to open su format data from others computer, the same error always arises: $ surange < 1.su surange: fgettr.c: on trace #2 number of samples in header (58361) differs from number for first trace (53255) It is caused by the compatibility probelm between different computers. You know that SEG-Y have at least 5 floating data format, while su possesses only one format belong to the specific computer.

item.title: SU常用命令
item.description: sukeyword 查看su关键字 %Usage: sukeyword -o %在终端输出segy.h sukeyword [str] %在终端输出segy.h中所有与[str]匹配的字段 常见keywords包括tracl，f

item.title: install macOS theme on ubuntu
item.description: 鉴于个人一直使用mac，所以对mac的桌面环境更为喜欢。noobslab的一群天才们在ubuntu每一个版本发布之后都会出一个教程来帮助大家

item.title: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
item.description: After i complete to install matlab R2016b on ubuntu, i tried to modify the default fonts. I thought i might make some mistakes and when i restarted MATLAB it threw out some error as follows: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at com.mathworks.mde.cmdwin.XCmdWndView.<init>(XCmdWndView.java:353) at com.mathworks.mde.cmdwin.XCmdWndView.<clinit>(XCmdWndView.java:314) at com.mathworks.mde.cmdwin.CmdWin.<init>(CmdWin.java:96) at com.mathworks.mde.cmdwin.CmdWin.<clinit>(CmdWin.java:92) at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source) at com.mathworks.jmi.ClassLoaderManager.loadClass(ClassLoaderManager.java:442) at com.mathworks.jmi.ClassLoaderManager.findClass(ClassLoaderManager.java:422) at com.mathworks.jmi.Matlab$1.findClass(Matlab.java:465) at com.mathworks.util.ClassLoaderBridge.findClass(ClassLoaderBridge.java:24) at com.mathworks.widgets.desk.DTClient.createComponent(DTClient.java:246) at com.mathworks.widgets.desk.Desktop.createClientComponent(Desktop.java:5646) at com.mathworks.mde.desk.MLDesktop.createClientComponent(MLDesktop.java:895) ... However, i could start MATLAB normally on terminal with matlab -nodisplay.

item.title: install QQ_light_deepin on ubuntu 16.10
item.description: when i upgraded my ubunutu from 16.04 to 16.10, i found that i cannot use qq_intel on this platform. It threw out an error indicating that this qq_intel is too old for my QQ account. After some trials, i found qq_light_deepin and it works well on my ubuntu 16.10 platform. install crossover download CROSSOVER 16.0 and install it $ sudo dpkg -i crossover_16.0.0-1.deb # in case of lacking of some dependences, try follows to fix the broken $ sudo apt-get -f install download CROSSOVER crack and replace the old one under the installation path

item.title: Btsync下载与安装
item.description: 1.下载linux平台 Btsync 2. 解压并添加环境变量 # cd /usr/local # sudo mkdir btsync # sudo tar xzf stable -C btsync # sudo rm stable # sudo gedit ~/.bashrc > export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/btsync 3. 配置btsync btsync安装包中没有配置

item.title: 谈谈我的科研Tools
item.description: 多PC同步 云盘 坚果云，多平台 百度云同步盘 for windows BTSync Fast, simple, and secure file syncing for IT and individuals. 一个简单的文件传输工具，他使用p2p协议传输文件，以最大的安全度、网络带宽
